issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Change tests in sql.rs to use `assert_batch`
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11716](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11716). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

The idea is to make the tests in [sql.rs](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/rust/datafusion/tests/sql.rs#L103) more maintainable by using the `assert_batches_eq` macro that was introduced here: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9264
